chapters.title: Chapter 19: Gambits
chapters.info: Selucia, p. 296—Tuon's Truthspeaker, and her Voice now that she has removed the veil. She keeps the right side of her head shaved clean, the other side braided. She is the one who shaves Tuon's head every morning. She has golden hair, piercing blue eyes, skin the color of buttery cream, and an “impressive” bosom. She is effectively a prisoner of Mat, along with her mistress. See also Paendrag, Tuon Athaem Kore.
